subsection.name: (0) Rationale
subsection.p: What does the your-project Package provide?

subsection.name: (1) Scope of the Package
subsection.p: Commons projects should have a tight scope, so define that scope here.

subsection.name: (1.5) Interaction With Other Packages
subsection.p: your-project relies only on standard JDK 1.2 (or later) APIs for production deployment. It utilizes the JUnit unit testing framework for developing and executing unit tests, but this is of interest only to developers of the component.
No external configuration files are utilized.

subsection.name: (2) Initial Source of the Package
subsection.p: Where did the source code from your-project come from?
The proposed package name for the new component is org.apache.commons.lc-your-project.

ul.li: CVS Repository - New directory lc-your-project in the jakarta-commons CVS repository.

Mailing List - Discussions will take place on the general dev@commons.apache.org mailing list. To help list subscribers identify messages of interest, it is suggested that the message subject of messages about this component be prefixed with [lc-your-project].
Bugzilla - New component "your-project" under the "Commons" product category, with appropriate version identifiers as needed.

subsection.name: (4) Initial Committers
subsection.p:
The initial committers on the your-project component shall be as follows:
Your Name Here (ynhere)
